reviews.text:
This is a Curio Brand hotel.  This property does not live up to the Curio standards. 

Paint was peeling off the ceilings and walls.  Furniture was worn and tired.

Rooms were not adequately supplied...
reviews.title: Not up to up expected Curio standards.
